channel.title: [PI]How would I make a player respawn in a different area if they are in (coord)
channel.description: How would I make a player spawn to a different place then normally, if when they die they are in a certain area. If they were in: X1 = 2917 Y1 = 9692 X2 = 2894 Y2 = 9670 And when you died you re-spawned to: X = 2906 Y = 9680

item.title: [PI]How would I make a player respawn in a different area if they are in (coord)
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

Respawning in a Different spot if your in a certain Area

  • Check if the player is in a certain spot.
  • If they’re in that spot, make them respawn in your custom spot.
  • If they’re not then make them respawn in the default spot.

Respawning when you die and you aren’t in that Area

  • Check if you aren’t in your ‘Certain Spot’, if you aren’t respawn in your default spot.
  • Make sure in your applyDead(); method that when you die you are teleported to your respawn spot.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI]How would I make a player respawn in a different area if they are in (coord)

item.title: [PI]How would I make a player respawn in a different area if they are in (coord)
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“purestmage74, post:2, topic:443352”]Lol, just go into the ‘applyDead()’ method, look for where it’s saying 'if (c.isDead()) { moveHere(x,y,z); }

Do a simple little check:

if (c.absX >= X1 && c.absX <= X2 && c.absY >= Y1 && c.absY <= Y2) {
// code here on where to teleport them too?
}

HeHe ( PlayerAssistant.java = public void applyDead() { )[/quote]
Did you mean give life?

item.title: [PI]How would I make a player respawn in a different area if they are in (coord)
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

All of my other re-spawn points are in config.java.
And it looks like this:

public static final int RESPAWN_X = 2843; 
public static final int RESPAWN_Y = 10205;

Where you pointed me to just said:

     public void applyDead() {
	         int weapon = c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon];
		c.respawnTimer = 15;
		c.isDead = false;
		Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId];
		Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[c.killerId];
		if(c.duelStatus != 6) {
			c.killerId = findKiller();
			if(o != null) {
				c.playerKilled = c.playerId;
				if(o.duelStatus == 5) {
					o.duelStatus++;
				}
